list.name: MANSIONS-OF-MEEPLE
list.description: Meeple's next attack creates dice towers around the impact area and deals x damage.
list.descriptionHtml: Meeple's next attack creates dice towers around the impact area and deals x damage.

list.name: RAGEQUIT
list.description: Meeple lashes out in rage at nearby enemies, stunning and knocking them back. The less hitpoints Meeple has, the stun and knockback effects increase.
list.descriptionHtml: Meeple lashes out in rage at nearby enemies, stunning and knocking them back. The less hitpoints Meeple has, the stun and knockback effects increase.
